messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "web-planning-sync-agenda-notes",
      "name": "WEB – Website Redesign Planning Sync Agenda & Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-19T10:05:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB – Website Redesign Planning Sync
Date: Friday, Nov 21, 2025
Time: 10:00–11:00 (JST)
Location: Conference Room B / Google Meet
Organizer: Alex Smith
Participants: Alex, Jordan, Sam, Taylor

Agenda (from calendar invite / email):
1. Review WEB-100 (Initial Setup) outcomes
2. Status and scope of WEB-101 (Core Feature)
3. Confirm scope for first development iteration
4. Align on timeline for Development (Nov 20) and Launch (Nov 30)

Pre-reads:
- Jira: WEB-100 – Website Redesign - Initial Setup (Status: Done)
- Jira: WEB-101 – Website Redesign - Core Feature (Status: In Progress)

Notes (to be filled in during meeting):
1. WEB-100 outcomes
- Environment setup: [ ] complete
- Design system baseline: [ ] approved
- Dependencies identified: [ ] documented

2. WEB-101 status
- Current progress summary:
- Outstanding questions for dev:

3. First dev iteration scope
- Must-have items for initial release:
- Nice-to-have / backlog items:

4. Timeline alignment
- Planning milestone: Nov 10, 2025
- Development milestone: Nov 20, 2025
- Launch target: Nov 30, 2025

Action items:
- [ ] Owner: Alex – Update WEB-101 scope in Jira based on meeting decisions
- [ ] Owner: Jordan – Confirm timeline feasibility with engineering
- [ ] Owner: Sam – Validate UX implications for first iteration
- [ ] Owner: Taylor – Review and sign off on final scope
"
    },
    {
      "id": "web-planning-sync-slide-deck",
      "name": "WEB Planning Sync – WEB-100 & WEB-101 Overview",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-19T10:10:00+09:00",
      "content": "Slide 1 – Title
Website Redesign (WEB)
Planning Sync – Friday, Nov 21, 2025
Facilitator: Alex Smith

Slide 2 – Objectives
- Align on outcomes from WEB-100 (Initial Setup)
- Review current status of WEB-101 (Core Feature)
- Confirm scope for first development iteration
- Validate dates for Development (Nov 20) and Launch (Nov 30)

Slide 3 – WEB-100 Summary (Status: Done)
- Environment and tooling set up
- Base layout and navigation framework created
- Initial design system tokens implemented
- Risks identified: performance budget, content migration

Slide 4 – WEB-101 Overview (Status: In Progress)
- Goal: Implement core feature set for redesigned homepage
- In scope: hero, primary navigation, key CTAs, analytics events
- Out of scope (future iterations): personalization, advanced search

Slide 5 – Proposed First Dev Iteration Scope
- Deliver responsive homepage MVP matching approved designs
- Implement tracking for top 3 CTAs
- Ensure accessibility to AA level for key flows

Slide 6 – Milestones & Next Steps
- Planning: Nov 10 (completed)
- Development: Nov 20 – Nov 29
- Launch: Nov 30
- Next steps:
  - Finalize iteration scope today
  - Update WEB-101 Jira tickets
  - Confirm QA and content freeze dates
"
    },
    {
      "id": "web-meeting-log-friday-sync",
      "name": "WEB – Friday Planning Sync Log",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T11:15:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB – Website Redesign
Friday Planning Sync Log

Meeting: WEB – Website Redesign Planning Sync
Date: Friday, Nov 21, 2025
Time: 10:00–11:00 (JST)
Location: Conference Room B / Google Meet
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams, Taylor Brown

Summary:
- Confirmed that WEB-100 initial setup is fully complete with no blockers.
- Agreed on a focused scope for the first development iteration of WEB-101.
- Re-affirmed the Development milestone (Nov 20) and Launch date (Nov 30) as achievable.

Decisions:
1) WEB-100 (Initial Setup)
- All setup tasks are marked Done in Jira.
- No additional work needed before starting the dev iteration.

2) WEB-101 (Core Feature)
- First iteration scope:
  - Homepage hero module
  - Primary navigation
  - Top 3 call-to-action components
  - Basic analytics tracking for key events
- Defer advanced personalization and search enhancements to WEB-102.

3) Timeline
- Development window: Nov 20–29
- Code freeze: Nov 28 EOD
- Soft Launch / Feature flag rollout: Nov 30

Action Items:
- Alex: Update WEB-101 subtasks in Jira to reflect agreed scope by EOD today.
- Jordan: Confirm engineering capacity for the Nov 20–29 window.
- Sam: Update UX documentation and attach to WEB-101.
- Taylor: Review updated WEB-101 scope and formally approve in Jira.
"
    }
  ]
}
